unipd.title: University of Padua
unipd.description: Bachelor's Degree School of Sciences, IT specialization. In-depth knowledge of many programming languages, both functional and object-oriented. Acquisition of best practices in the field of software development regarding its life cycle and management of the organization of the development team through agile methodologies.

datasoil.title: Datasoil
datasoil.description: Full-time Back-end Developer, responsible for developing and maintaining a Digital Twin platform to support business operations, from asset management to ticketing. My work focuses on back-end development in Golang, using MongoDB as the database, and managing deployment and monitoring via AWS services. I also handle real-time data stream analysis and processing, ensuring platform efficiency and reliability.
